metadata.title: CVE-2019-13464 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in OWASP ModSecurity Core Rule Set (CRS) 3.0.2. Useof X.Filename instead of X_Filename can bypass some PHP Script Uploadsrules, because PHP automatically transforms dots into underscores incertain contexts where dots are invalid.

criterions.comment: modsecurity-crs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
